meanings.definition: The part of a stamen that contains the pollen
meanings.sent1: The anthers release pollen for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: Bees collect pollen from the anthers of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The anthers seemed to be playing hide and seek with the bees.
meanings.sent4: The anthers were like tiny treasure chests full of life.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow anthers stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The male reproductive organ of a flower
meanings.sent1: Each flower has anthers that produce pollen.
meanings.sent2: The anthers play a crucial role in pollination.
meanings.sent3: The anthers of the flower were the talk of the garden party.
meanings.sent4: The anthers stood tall like proud fathers of the plant world.
meanings.sent5: The anthers danced in the breeze, spreading life around.
